text: *Take a look at some of my projects below. You can always find more on my [Observable](https://observablehq.com/@duynguyen1678), [Bl.ocks](https://bl.ocks.org/duynguyen158), or [GitHub](https://github.com/duynguyen158) profile. If you have visualization ideas (they don't have to be newsroom-related) or are interested in collaborating, don't hesitate to reach out!*
